commit.message: Nest the `impl Trait` existential item inside the return type

files.patch:
@@ -339,6 +339,7 @@ impl_stable_hash_for!(enum hir::TyKind {
     Never,
     Tup(ts),
     Path(qpath),
+    Def(it, lt),
     TraitObject(trait_refs, lifetime),
     Typeof(body_id),
     Err,

@@ -46,23 +46,11 @@ error: type `m::Priv` is private
 LL | fn g() -> impl Tr2<m::Alias> { 0 } //~ ERROR type `m::Priv` is private
    |           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
 
-error: type `m::Priv` is private
-  --> $DIR/private-type-in-interface.rs:37:16
-   |
-LL | fn g() -> impl Tr2<m::Alias> { 0 } //~ ERROR type `m::Priv` is private
-   |                ^^^^^^^^^^^^^

 error: type `ext::Priv` is private
